page.title: 15Caretaker Poem
page.content: Take Care Now {_______________ From early morning till late at night, Our caretaker is on the site. He strolls so softly here and there; Quiet as a mouse, silent as a prayer. {Checking on windows, doors and locks; {Pops up if needed like Jack in the box {There's glass on the pitch every day {But our Mr Lynch'll soon sweep it away When the fence needs fixing, He's quickly on the scene And if it's safely mended You know that he has been. {Thunder & lightning, {The clouds pour rain. {If the roof is leaking {He'll mop it up again. In your retirement live long,live well Mr Lynch and your good wife, We bid you fond farewell. {(O.L.R.Eldon St)
